item.title: W3b3num
item.description: Readme.md ğŸ‘‹ W3b3num A Simple W3b enumeration Script for Pentests.works for both Linux and Windows. Installation: Just git clone it using git clone https://github.com/Xeroxxhah/W3b3num.git install requirements using python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt Now simply python3 w3b3num.py <HOST> Bug report Found any bug! Report it to me at xeroxxhah@pm.me or open an issue Contributions: All contributions are welcomed.fork this repo,improve it and pull requests License Distributed under GPLV3.0

item.title: Carckemall

Installation: Just git clone it using git clone https://github.com/Xeroxxhah/CrackemAll.git install requirements using python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt Now simply python3 cmall.py <mode> <file> <worldlist> Bug report Found any bug! Report it to me at xeroxxhah@pm.me or open an issue Contributions: All contributions are welcomed.fork this repo,improve it and pull requests License Distributed under GPLV3.0

item.title: B1k1
Appsafe
item.description: README.md ğŸ‘‹ AppSafe A simple App Locker written in python. Installation: You can simply install with sudo pip3 install git+https://github.com/Xeroxxhah/AppSafe.git OR Follow these steps: 1st: git clone https://github.com/Xeroxxhah/AppSafe.git 2nd cd AppSafe 3rd sudo python3 setup.py install Usage sudo appsafe Bug report Found any bug! Report it to me at xeroxxhah@pm.me or open an issue Updates: Soon .. Contributions: All contributions are welcomed.fork this repo,improve it and pull requests License Distributed under GPLV3.

item.title: Dos.py
item.description: Readme.md ğŸ‘‹ DOS.PY A Simple yet powerfull Dos script. Installation: Just git clone it using git clone https://github.com/Xeroxxhah/DOS.PY.git Dos.py has only one dependency,i.e scapy.you can install it using python3 -m pip install scapy. Usage: â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ•—â–‘â–‘â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ•—â–‘â–‘â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ•—â–‘â–‘â–‘â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ•—â–‘â–ˆâ–ˆâ•—â–‘â–‘â–‘â–ˆâ–ˆâ•— â–ˆâ–ˆâ•”â•â•â–ˆâ–ˆâ•—â–ˆâ–ˆâ•”â•â•â–ˆâ–ˆâ•—â–ˆâ–ˆâ•”â•â•â•â•â•â–‘â–‘â–‘â–ˆâ–ˆâ•”â•â•â–ˆâ–ˆâ•—â•šâ–ˆâ–ˆâ•—â–‘â–ˆâ–ˆâ•”â• â–ˆâ–ˆâ•‘â–‘â–‘â–ˆâ–ˆâ•‘â–ˆâ–ˆâ•‘â–‘â–‘â–ˆâ–ˆâ•‘â•šâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ•—â–‘â–‘â–‘â–‘â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ•”â•â–‘â•šâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ•”â•â–‘ â–ˆâ–ˆâ•‘â–‘â–‘â–ˆâ–ˆâ•‘â–ˆâ–ˆâ•‘â–‘â–‘â–ˆâ–ˆâ•‘â–‘â•šâ•â•â•â–ˆâ–ˆâ•—â–‘â–‘â–‘â–ˆâ–ˆâ•”â•â•â•â•â–‘â–‘â–‘â•šâ–ˆâ–ˆâ•”â•â–‘â–‘ â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ•”â•â•šâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ•”â•â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆâ•”â•â–ˆâ–ˆâ•—â–ˆâ–ˆâ•‘â–‘â–‘â–‘â–‘â–‘â–‘â–‘â–‘â–ˆâ–ˆâ•‘â–‘â–‘â–‘ â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â–‘â–‘â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â–‘â•šâ•â•â•â•â•â•â–‘â•šâ•â•â•šâ•â•â–‘â–‘â–‘â–‘â–‘â–‘â–‘â–‘â•šâ•â•â–‘â–‘â–‘ A simple yet powerful Dos script VERSION:0.1.0 Usage: sudo python3 dos.py <IP> <Port> <no of processes> <type> Example: sudo python3 dos.py 180.50.44.96 80 5000 S Note: Please specify number of processes acording to your system memory or your system might get hang.

item.title: 6u4rd
item.description: README.md ğŸ‘‹ 6u4rd Your backdoor for your device. It is a simple utility when it is up and running; you get an email every hour with a unique link. You are presented with a hideous dashboard; you can control your device using this dashboard. Don’t ask me why i did it (._.). Installation & Usage: Follow these steps: 1st: git clone https://github.com/Xeroxxhah/6u4rd.git 2nd: cd 6u4rd 3rd: pip install -r requirements.txt 4th: Setup Dummy Account (Gmail) 5th: Get ngrok token 5th python3 6u4rd.
